/react-text --></span><span class="Feed-meta-item">32 分钟前</span></div></div><div class="ContentItem AnswerItem" data-za-module="AnswerItem" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer" itemprop="answer" name="247108114" data-zop="{&quot;authorName&quot;:&quot;匿名用户&quot;,&quot;itemId&quot;:247108114,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;主板上的南北桥是什么东西？&quot;,&quot;type&quot;:&quot;answer&quot;}" data-za-module-info="{&quot;card&quot;:{&quot;has_image&quot;:false,&quot;has_video&quot;:false,&quot;content&quot;:{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;Answer&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;247108114&quot;,&quot;upvote_num&quot;:3,&quot;comment_num&quot;:0,&quot;publish_timestamp&quot;:null,&quot;parent_token&quot;:&quot;66881178&quot;,&quot;author_member_hash_id&quot;:&quot;0&quot;}}}"><h2 class="ContentItem-title"><div itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Question" itemprop="zhihu:question"><meta content="https://www.zhihu.com/question/66881178" itemprop="url" /><meta content="主板上的南北桥是什么东西？" itemprop="name" /><a href="/question/66881178/answer/247108114" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-element_name="Title">主板上的南北桥是什么东西？</a></div></h2><div class="ContentItem-meta"><div class="AnswerItem-meta"><div class="AuthorInfo AuthorInfo--plain" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemprop="author"><meta content="匿名用户" itemprop="name" /><meta content="https://pic2.zhimg.com/aadd7b895_s.jpg" itemprop="image" /><meta content="https://www.zhihu.com/people/" itemprop="url" /><meta itemprop="zhihu:followerCount" /><span class="UserLink AuthorInfo-avatarWrapper"><img width="24" height="24" class="Avatar AuthorInfo-avatar" alt="匿名用户" src="https://pic2.zhimg.com/aadd7b895_s.jpg" srcset="https://pic2.zhimg.com/aadd7b895_xs.jpg 2x" /></span><div class="AuthorInfo-content"><div class="AuthorInfo-head"><span class="UserLink AuthorInfo-name"><!-- react-text: 2524 -->匿名用户<!-- /react-text --></span></div><div class="AuthorInfo-detail"><div class="AuthorInfo-badge"><!-- react-empty: 2527 --></div></div></div></div></div></div><meta content="https://pic4.zhimg.com/50/v2-36471131bbfba92cd0c8ee9f5a618013_200x112.jpg" itemprop="image" /><meta content="3" itemprop="upvoteCount" /><meta content="https://www.zhihu.com/question/66881178/answer/247108114" itemprop="url" /><meta content="2017-10-19T16:36:52.000Z" itemprop="dateCreated" /><meta content="2017-10-19T16:36:52.000Z" itemprop="dateModified" /><meta content="0" itemprop="commentCount" /><div class="RichContent is-collapsed"><div class="RichContent-cover"><div class="RichContent-cover-inner"><div class="VagueImage" style="width: 190px; height: 105px;" data-src="https://pic4.zhimg.com/50/v2-36471131bbfba92cd0c8ee9f5a618013_400x224.jpg"><div class="VagueImage-mask is-active"></div></div></div></div><div class="RichContent-inner"><span class="RichText CopyrightRichText-richText" itemprop="text">系统设计上将 I/O 工作层层转包。CPU 把比较慢的 bus 转包给北桥，北桥把更慢的 bus 转包给南桥，南桥把更更慢的 bus 转包给 Super I/O。…</span><button --><!-- /react-text --><div class="RichContent-inner"><span class="RichText CopyrightRichText-richText" itemprop="text">其实飞行员特别是试飞员更想保护的不是“几个月就能造出来的飞机”，而是“处在故障状态的飞机” 如果能保下来，找故障点加以改进就容易得多，如果落地摔成个稀…</span><button class="Button ContentItem-more Button--plain" type="button"><!-- react-text: 4479 -->阅读全文<!-- /react-text --><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="RichContent-inner"><span class="RichText CopyrightRichText-richText" itemprop="text"><b>上面很多大拿已经说得很清楚了，我来说说借条那些容易出错的地方吧！</b> 借条，是最常见的法律文书之一，往往大手一挥就能写成，方便又快捷。但借条，也是最容易引发纠纷的法律文书，往往只要写错一个字，就会遇到很多麻…</span><button class="Button ContentItem-more Button--plain" type="button"><!-- react-text: 5927 -->阅读全文<!-- /react-text --><svg class="ContentItem-title"><div itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Question" itemprop="zhihu:question"><meta content="https://www.zhihu.com/question/48553135" itemprop="url" /><meta class="RichText CopyrightRichText-richText" itemprop="text">一句话回答。药品注册申请时提交的资料都是保密的。全部资料都不可以对外公开，除非药厂特别授权。 多说两句， 药厂交给政府的审批材料属于公司机密 （Bu…</span><button class="Button ContentItem-more Button--plain" /></g></svg></button><!-- react-empty: 13715 --></div><div class="ContentItem-actions"><span><button class="Button VoteButton VoteButton--up" aria-label="赞同" type="button"><svg
